roster.selectStudentError: Please select at least one student
roster.name: Name
roster.removeStudentConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this student from the class? This action cannot be undone.
roster.removeStudentConfirmMessage: You are about to remove the following student from this class:
roster.removeStudentWarning: This action cannot be undone. The student will lose access to all class materials and grades.
roster.searchByNameOrEmail: Search for students by name or email. Click to select multiple students.

grades.assessmentContentPlaceholder: Describe what this assessment covers (e.g., Chapters 1-5, Topics: Data Structures, etc.)
grades.assessmentContentHint: Optional: Provide details about the assessment content. This helps students understand what to study and improves AI recommendations.
grades.createAssessment: Create a new assessment for all students. Add individual grades by clicking on empty cells.
grades.createAssessmentHint: This will create a new column. Add grades for each student by clicking on the empty cells.
grades.enterGradeInfo: Enter grade information for a student
grades.gradesWillAppear: Grades will appear here once your teacher adds them
grades.editAssessmentDescription: Update the assessment details. This will update all grades for this assessment.
grades.editAssessmentHint: Changing the assessment name or type will update all related grades. The max score change will affect all grades for this assessment.
grades.feedbackPlaceholder: Add personalized feedback for this student...
grades.feedbackHint: Optional: Provide specific feedback to help the student improve.

recommendations.regenerateDisclaimer: You are about to regenerate the class recommendation. This action will create a new recommendation based on the current grades in the system.
recommendations.regenerateWarningDescription: Only regenerate if you have added new grades since the last recommendation was generated. Regenerating without new data will create a duplicate recommendation based on the same information.
recommendations.noClassRecommendations: No class-level recommendations yet. Generate one to get started!
recommendations.noStudentRecommendations: No student-level recommendations yet. Generate one to get started!
recommendations.noRecommendations: No recommendations yet. Click the button above to generate AI-powered insights for your class.
recommendations.generateDescription: Generate recommendations based on your class performance to get personalized insights
recommendations.generateAssessmentRecommendation: Generate AI recommendation for this assessment
recommendations.viewRecommendation: View AI recommendation for this assessment
recommendations.noAssessmentRecommendation: No recommendation generated yet for this assessment.
